message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even beyond your initial assessment.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $17,000?
I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $17,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $14,000?
